div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 267 Achaea?, before 1940 Burial: c. 150-140 B.C. (T) Contents: 48 AR Thespiae?: 1 triob. Chalcis: 10 dr. Histiaea: 2 tetrob. Sicyon: 31 triob. Achaean League: 3 triob. (1 Megara, 2 Elis of late style) Megalopolis: 1 triob. Disposition: Athens Oeconomides, Archaiologike Analecta ex Athen≈çn 1968, Part II, pp. 73-6, illus. See no. 260 above
